import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthenticationComponent } from './authentication/authentication.component'; import { ChatScreenComponent } from './chat-service/chat-screen.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-panel', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, AuthenticationComponent, ChatScreenComponent], templateUrl: './side-panel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-panel.component.scss'], }) export class SidePanelComponent { isAuthenticated = false; // State to track authentication handleAuthenticationStatus(status: boolean) { this.isAuthenticated = status; // Set authentication state } }
